introduction: This video discusses the passion for computer innovation and its combination of creativity and technical knowledge. It covers the various degrees and certificates in digital graphics and animation offered at Saint Paul College, emphasizing their affordability and flexibility for learners of all backgrounds. The video also highlights the growing demand for professionals in the digital industry and the opportunities available for those interested in web design and animation.

sections.title: Section 1: Passion for Computer Innovation
content: Discovering new ways to create something and finding inspiration from cartoons and 3D animated movies.
Combining creativity and technical knowledge in computer innovation.
Exploring various jobs in the industry, such as web developers, front-end designers, and game designers.
Introducing Saint Paul College's digital graphics and animation programs.

sections.title: Section 2: Degrees and Certificates in Digital Graphics and Animation
content: Overview of the two degrees offered at Saint Paul College: AS and AAS.
Recommendations for people considering a four-year degree and those seeking a two-year degree.
Five different certificates covering classes in digital graphics.
Diversity in class and meeting people from various backgrounds.

sections.title: Section 3: Scholarship Opportunities and Flexible Course Times
content: Saint Paul College's scholarship opportunities for adult learners.
Flexible course times to accommodate different schedules.
Instructor approachability and willingness to help students understand the material.
Affordability and variety in the field of web design and animation.

sections.title: Section 4: Web Design and Animation Programs at Saint Paul College
content: Overview of the web design and animation programs at Saint Paul College.
Focus on affordability and variety in the field.
Introduction to game design, a web-based program.
Opportunities for people interested in video games and animation.

sections.title: Section 5: Saint Paul College's Digital Graphics and Animation Programs
content: Overview of the digital graphics and animation programs offered at Saint Paul College.
Introduction to 2D and 3D animation.
Launching a game design program entirely online.
Opportunities for people interested in animation and web design.
